Research Projects

Explore our ongoing and completed research projects in computer vision and related fields.

Real-time Object Detection

Developing efficient algorithms for detecting objects in images and videos.

Project Details

3D Scene Reconstruction

Reconstructing detailed 3D models from multiple camera views.

Project Details

DeepOcular: Deep Learning for Ocular Biometrics

Active

Research and development of novel deep learning architectures for ocular biometrics, including iris, periocular, and sclera recognition. The project focuses on challenging scenarios like low-resolution, off-angle, and degraded images.

Deep Learning Ocular Biometrics Computer Vision

Team Members

  • Hugo Proença
  • Joana C. Costa
  • David Menotti
  • Maria Rodriguez

Related Publications

  • Attention-based Deep Architecture for Periocular Recognition
  • Multi-spectral Iris Recognition in Unconstrained Settings
Project Details Project Website GitHub Repository

VisualSurveillance: Privacy-Preserving Video Analytics

Active

Development of privacy-preserving technologies for video surveillance systems, including face de-identification, activity recognition without identity disclosure, and secure multi-party computation for distributed video analytics.

Privacy Video Analytics Security Computer Vision

Team Members

  • Hugo Proença
  • David Menotti
  • Alex Chen

Related Publications

  • Privacy-Preserving Face Recognition in Surveillance Systems
  • Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving Activity Recognition
Project Details Project Website GitHub Repository

MedicalVision: AI for Medical Image Analysis

Completed

Application of computer vision and deep learning techniques to medical imaging problems, including tumor detection, segmentation of anatomical structures, and longitudinal analysis of disease progression.

Medical Imaging Deep Learning Healthcare Segmentation

Team Members

  • David Menotti
  • Joana C. Costa
  • Maria Rodriguez

Related Publications

  • Automated Detection of COVID-19 in Chest X-Ray Images
  • Deep Learning for Lung Nodule Segmentation
Project Details GitHub Repository Live Demo

Intelligent Systems

The Intelligent Systems Laboratory at the University of Beira Interior focuses on computer vision, pattern recognition, and biometrics research.
